briefTitle: The Effects of Vitamin D Repletion in Vitamin D Deficient Patients With Stage 3 and 4 Chronic Kidney Disease
officialTitle: The Effects of Vitamin D Repletion in Vitamin D Deficient Patients With Stage 3 and 4 Chronic Kidney Disease
summary: A randomized clinical trial to determine if vitamin D repletion in CKD (Chronic Kidney Disease) patients with low vitamin D levels will decrease proteinuria, a marker of kidney damage.

primaryOutcome.measure: Effect of Vitamin D Supplementation on Albuminuria in CKD Patients as Assessed by Urine Albumin/Creatinine Measures.
